com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.engine.dhRobot

Class DHRobot

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.marginallyclever.robotOverlord.engine.dhRobot.DHRobot

  • public class DHRobot
extends Observable
    A robot designed using D-H parameters.
    Author:
    Dan Royer

      • sanityCheck

        public boolean sanityCheck(DHKeyframe keyframe)
        checks that the keyframe is sane that no collisions occur.
        Parameters:
        keyframe -
        Returns:
        false if the keyframe is not sane or a collision occurs.

      • collidesWithSelf

        public boolean collidesWithSelf(DHKeyframe keyframe)
        Test physical bounds of link N against all links <N-1 and all links >N+1 We're using separating Axis Theorem. See https://gamedev.stackexchange.com/questions/25397/obb-vs-obb-collision-detection
        Parameters:
        keyframe - the angles at time of test
        Returns:
        true if there are no collisions

      • collidesWithWorld

        public boolean collidesWithWorld(DHKeyframe keyframe)
        Test physical bounds of all links with the world. We're using separating Axis Theorem. See https://gamedev.stackexchange.com/questions/25397/obb-vs-obb-collision-detection
        Parameters:
        keyframe - the angles at time of test
        Returns:
        true if there are no collisions

      • keyframeAnglesAreOK

        public boolean keyframeAnglesAreOK(DHKeyframe keyframe)
        Perform a sanity check. Make sure the angles in the keyframe are within the joint range limits.
        Parameters:
        keyframe -
        Returns:

      • setPoseIK

        public boolean setPoseIK(javax.vecmath.Matrix4d m)
        Find the forward kinematic pose of robot r that would give an end effector matrix matching m. If the FK pose is found, set the adjustable values of the links to said pose.
        Parameters:
        r - the DHRobot to set
        m - the matrix of the finger tip of the robot, relative to the base of the robot.

      • setPoseFK

        public void setPoseFK(DHKeyframe keyframe)
        Set the robot's FK values to the keyframe values and then refresh the pose.
        Parameters:
        keyframe -

      • getPoseFK

        public void getPoseFK(DHKeyframe keyframe)
        Set the robot's FK values to the keyframe values and then refresh the pose.
        Parameters:
        keyframe - to set
